message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth more to me.  Could you meet me halfway at $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to consider a price of $95?
